name: Trains (Sportscene Specialist Press)
overview: The object of this game by Clive Emberey and published in Your 64 No.05 1984/12-1985/01 is to operate the points of a railway network. You have to keep an increasing number of trains on the move without any of them derailing or colliding. As an added problem, some of the points will (of course) fail and close themselves down for repairs. Trains is a game calling for both strategy and fast reactions.
